name: Shot Down
description:
This is a hard and very challenging game you will have to get through 39 levels. Every level is very frustrating and has it´s own design. The game takes around 15-50 minutes to complete. 15 if you speed run it like a pro. Your experience with the game will probably be you dying a lot and getting frustrated. If you get stuck you can go here for help.

Story

You are a package deliverer. You are delivering a package when your space ship gets shot down by another space ship. You crash into the other space ship and you got to get through it to get to the escape pods.

Enemy

The most common enemies are turrets that will shoot at you. Some can move, some have spikes that will kill you, some are on a wall, some shoot faster. The other main enemy are lasers that will kill you instantly if you touch them. Turret

Minimum Recommended Specs
  • Memory : 4 GB maybe 2 GB
  • Video : 256 MB
  • Processor : 1.4 GHz
Controls
  • W, A, S, D - Move
  • Space - jump
  • Shift - Sprint
  • C - Crouch
  • R - Restart
  • Escape - show / hide menu

Install instructions

All the files are zipped so you may need a program to Unzip it.

Open the folder with your operating system.

Linux : If you are on Linux open "Shot Down Linux.x86" if you have a 32 bit operating system. Or "Shot Down Linux.x86_64" if you have a 64 bit operating system. if you don´t know open "Shot Down Linux.x86" to be on the safe side.

Windows : If you are on Windows open "Windows 32bit" and then open "Shot Down Windows.exe" if you have a 32 bit operating system. Or "Windows 64bit" and then "Shot Down Windows.exe" if you have a 64 bit operating system. if you don´t know open "Windows 32bit" and then open "Shot Down Windows.exe" to be on the safe side.

Mac : If you are on mac open "Shot Down Mac"
